00254 // inline methods
00255 
00256 inline bool CRange::IsValid() const
00257 {
00258        return (m_minValue <= m_maxValue);
00259 }
00260 
00261 
00262 inline bool CRange::IsEmpty() const
00263 {
00264        return (m_minValue == m_maxValue);
00265 }

00292 inline double CRange::GetLength() const
00293 {
00294        return IsValid()? m_maxValue - m_minValue: 0;
00295 }
00296 
00297 
00298 inline bool CRange::Contains(double value) const
00299 {
00300        I_ASSERT(IsValid());
00301 
00302        return (m_minValue <= value) && (m_maxValue >= value);
00303 }
00304 
00305 
00306 inline bool CRange::Contains(const CRange& range) const
00307 {
00308        I_ASSERT(IsValid());
00309        I_ASSERT(range.IsValid());
00310 
00311        return (m_minValue <= range.m_minValue) && (m_maxValue >= range.m_maxValue);
00312 }
00313 
00314 
00315 inline double CRange::GetValueFromAlpha(double alpha) const
00316 {
00317        return GetMinValue() + alpha * GetLength();
00318 }
00319 
00320 
00321 inline double CRange::GetAlphaFromValue(double value) const
00322 {
00323        return (value - GetMinValue()) / GetLength();
00324 }
00325 
00326 
00327 inline bool CRange::operator==(const CRange& range) const
00328 {
00329        return (m_maxValue == range.m_maxValue) && (m_minValue == range.m_minValue);
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 inline bool CRange::operator!=(const CRange& range) const
00334 {
00335        return (m_maxValue != range.m_maxValue) || (m_minValue != range.m_minValue);
00336 }
